multiple_choice.question: What did the crows get everyday?
Where did Anansi the Spider fall?
What did the crocodiles give Anansi to eat?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: The sight of so many figs made Anansi's mouth water
Anansi fell into the river right among the crocodiles
I want to go and fetch my wife and children from across the river

meanings.distance: the length of the space between two points
meanings.suspicious: showing a cautious distrust of someone
meanings.luscious: having a pleasingly rich, sweet taste

meanings.morsel: a small piece or amount of food
